findDatasetByUrl

@Transactional(readOnly=true,
               value="catalogue")
public Dataset findDatasetByUrl(String url)
Description copied from interface: MetadataRepository
Returns dataset associated with this URL. Throws DatasetNotFoundException if no matching dataset was found

Specified by:
findDatasetByUrl in interface MetadataRepository
Parameters:
url - dataset URL
Returns:
dataset or throws DatasetNotFoundException if no matching dataset was found

findDatasets

@Transactional(readOnly=true,
               value="catalogue")
public DatasetSearchResult findDatasets(String username,
                                                      List<Long> projects,
                                                      String query,
                                                      int startIndex,
                                                      int pageSize)
Description copied from interface: MetadataRepository
Returns all datasets owned by the user matching specified full text search query

Specified by:
findDatasets in interface MetadataRepository
Parameters:
username - username of the owner in DMS system
projects - list of project codes from booking system this username belongs to
query - full text search query
startIndex - index of the first dataset to display on the curect page
pageSize - max number of datasets to display on each page
Returns:
datasets of this user (one page)
